section.heading: Members and employees to have no interest in contracts.
section.text: No member or employee of said Board shall be either directly or indirectly interested in any contract for building, repairing, or furnishing any institution which by this chapter the Board of Public Welfare is authorized to investigate and supervise.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Charitable institutions, conflicts of interest, see § 44-714.
